trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="What's new in Azure RemoteApp?" description="Learn about changes and improvements made to Azure RemoteApp" services="remoteapp" documentationCenter="" authors="lizap" manager="mbaldwin" />
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="What's new in Azure RemoteApp?" description="Learn about changes and improvements made to Azure RemoteApp" services="remoteapp" documentationCenter="" authors="lizap" manager="mbaldwin" />

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="remoteapp" ms.workload="compute" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/12/2015" ms.author="elizapo" />
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="remoteapp" ms.workload="compute" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/12/2015" ms.author="elizapo" />

trans-unit.source: One of the advantages of RemoteApp is that we are always working to improve it.
trans-unit.target: One of the advantages of RemoteApp is that we are always working to improve it.

trans-unit.source: Every time we do, we'll announce those changes here.
trans-unit.target: Every time we do, we'll announce those changes here.

trans-unit.source: July set the stage for changes coming in August, so there's not a lot to talk about now, mostly doc updates.
trans-unit.target: July set the stage for changes coming in August, so there's not a lot to talk about now, mostly doc updates.

trans-unit.source: Here are the most recent changes:
trans-unit.target: Here are the most recent changes:

trans-unit.source: Added a Support tab to the portal so you can more easily access support resources, like the forums.
trans-unit.target: Added a Support tab to the portal so you can more easily access support resources, like the forums.

trans-unit.source: Reworked the troubleshooting information for creating a hybrid collection.
trans-unit.target: Reworked the troubleshooting information for creating a hybrid collection.

trans-unit.source: Check out <linkText>the latest and greatest</linkText><title></title> for troubleshooting tips like, how to identify the correct ports to configure for your VNET.
trans-unit.target: Check out <linkText>the latest and greatest</linkText><title></title> for troubleshooting tips like, how to identify the correct ports to configure for your VNET.

trans-unit.source: Documented how <linkText>user data</linkText><title></title> is created and saved in Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Documented how <linkText>user data</linkText><title></title> is created and saved in Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Documented how to <linkText>lock down apps</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Documented how to <linkText>lock down apps</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Published the <linkText>Azure RemoteApp cmdlets</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Published the <linkText>Azure RemoteApp cmdlets</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: And finally, we started a conversation with some Azure RemoteApp users about terminology.
trans-unit.target: And finally, we started a conversation with some Azure RemoteApp users about terminology.

trans-unit.source: Look for changes to the way we refer to the different collection options.
trans-unit.target: Look for changes to the way we refer to the different collection options.

trans-unit.source: So many changes!
trans-unit.target: So many changes!

trans-unit.source: The team has been very busy in June:
trans-unit.target: The team has been very busy in June:

trans-unit.source: Redesigned the Azure RemoteApp <linkText>landing page</linkText><title></title> - check it out!
trans-unit.target: Redesigned the Azure RemoteApp <linkText>landing page</linkText><title></title> - check it out!

trans-unit.source: Updated the software in all the images available as part of your subscription.
trans-unit.target: Updated the software in all the images available as part of your subscription.

trans-unit.source: Made improvements to hybrid collections, including forced tunneling support and checking IP subnet size before trying to create the collection.
trans-unit.target: Made improvements to hybrid collections, including forced tunneling support and checking IP subnet size before trying to create the collection.

trans-unit.source: Discovered that the * wildcard doesn't work for webcams.
trans-unit.target: Discovered that the * wildcard doesn't work for webcams.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you need to specify the instance ID or GUID.
trans-unit.target: Instead, you need to specify the instance ID or GUID.

trans-unit.source: We'll be updating the redirection information to reflect that.
trans-unit.target: We'll be updating the redirection information to reflect that.

trans-unit.source: Made it so you can add custom antivirus software to your image when you create a template image from the Azure gallery.
trans-unit.target: Made it so you can add custom antivirus software to your image when you create a template image from the Azure gallery.

trans-unit.source: We've got more changes rolling out in July, so we'll be back with another update soon.
trans-unit.target: We've got more changes rolling out in July, so we'll be back with another update soon.

trans-unit.source: There have been a number of additions (and months) since we first created this topic, so this list cheats a bit and is from the beginning of March through May.
trans-unit.target: There have been a number of additions (and months) since we first created this topic, so this list cheats a bit and is from the beginning of March through May.

trans-unit.source: Check out these new features:
trans-unit.target: Check out these new features:

trans-unit.source: Automate everything - Azure RemoteApp now has <linkText>cmdlets in the Azure PowerShell module</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Automate everything - Azure RemoteApp now has <linkText>cmdlets in the Azure PowerShell module</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create an Azure RemoteApp image from an Azure virtual machine</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create an Azure RemoteApp image from an Azure virtual machine</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Makes uploading your custom image to Azure much quicker.
trans-unit.target: Makes uploading your custom image to Azure much quicker.

trans-unit.source: Use an Azure VNET instead of a RemoteApp VNET to connect your corporate network resources to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Use an Azure VNET instead of a RemoteApp VNET to connect your corporate network resources to Azure.

trans-unit.source: We've updated the <linkText>hybrid collection instructions</linkText><title></title> to walk you through creating an Azure VNET (it's Step 1).
trans-unit.target: We've updated the <linkText>hybrid collection instructions</linkText><title></title> to walk you through creating an Azure VNET (it's Step 1).

trans-unit.source: Speaking of VNETs, check out <linkText>the new guidance</linkText><title></title> around VNET size limits and limitations.
trans-unit.target: Speaking of VNETs, check out <linkText>the new guidance</linkText><title></title> around VNET size limits and limitations.

trans-unit.source: And speaking of limits - just what are the <linkText>service limits and defaults</linkText><title></title>?
trans-unit.target: And speaking of limits - just what are the <linkText>service limits and defaults</linkText><title></title>?

trans-unit.source: Want to learn more about Azure RemoteApp?
trans-unit.target: Want to learn more about Azure RemoteApp?

trans-unit.source: The RemoteApp team was out in force at Ignite a few weeks ago.
trans-unit.target: The RemoteApp team was out in force at Ignite a few weeks ago.

trans-unit.source: Check out Eric's video, <linkText>The Fundamentals of Microsoft Azure RemoteApp Management and Administration</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Check out Eric's video, <linkText>The Fundamentals of Microsoft Azure RemoteApp Management and Administration</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Need to see Azure RemoteApp in the real world?
trans-unit.target: Need to see Azure RemoteApp in the real world?

trans-unit.source: Check out the <linkText>Run any app on any device anywhere</linkText><title></title> tutorial - it shows you how to share Access with your users, including sharing the database files.
trans-unit.target: Check out the <linkText>Run any app on any device anywhere</linkText><title></title> tutorial - it shows you how to share Access with your users, including sharing the database files.

trans-unit.source: We also have a tutorial on <linkText>making Office 365</linkText><title></title> run the same on any device.
trans-unit.target: We also have a tutorial on <linkText>making Office 365</linkText><title></title> run the same on any device.

trans-unit.source: Thanks for sticking with us - back next month with more updates.
trans-unit.target: Thanks for sticking with us - back next month with more updates.
